column3:
Concept ACK

> These are:
> 
>     * (Fee - LTF) == Change Cost
> 
>     * (Fee - LTF) == Excess

Strictly speaking it should be: 
   * (Fee - LTF) + Change Cost = 0  
      ⇒ (Fee - LTF) == -1×Change Cost  

   * (Fee - LTF) + Excess = 0
     ⇒ (Fee - LTF) == -1×Excess
Thanks @Xekyo for the review and agreed. It should be reversed. \n\nUpdated everywhere..

Thanks @jonatack for the review. Those were good suggestions.

Updated the comment description.
Updated commit message.
Updated with braced initialization.
@jonatack Sorry for my silly overlooks.. Updated now only..

```suggestion
    // 0 Waste when (long term fee - fee) == cost of change, and no excess
```
As it is currently written the two aren't equal but negatives of each other.

```suggestion
    // 0 Waste when (long term fee - fee) == excess, no change cost
```
Same here.

minor suggestions: `s/0 Waste/No waste/`, braced initialization for type safety, named args
```diff
@@ -724,25 +724,25 @@ BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(waste_test)
     BOOST_CHECK_LT(waste_nochange2, waste_nochange1);
     selection.clear();
 
-    // 0 Waste when fee == long term fee, no change, and no excess
+    // No waste when fee == long term fee, no change, and no excess
     add_co

only because your other calculations are in this order
```suggestion
    const CAmount exact_target{in_amt - fee * 2};
```
```suggestion\n    // No Waste when (fee - long_term_fee) == (-excess), no change cost\n```
